title: Deck Maintenance 101
description: Learn how to properly maintain your deck to extend its lifespan and keep it looking beautiful year-round.
tips: Clean your deck twice a year with deck cleaner
Inspect for loose boards and protruding nails annually
Reseal or restain every 2-3 years
Clear debris from between boards to prevent rot
Trim nearby vegetation to improve air circulation

title: How to Check Door Weatherstripping
description: Simple steps to identify and replace worn weatherstripping to save on energy costs.
tips: Check for light gaps around closed doors
Feel for drafts on windy days
Replace weatherstripping every 5-7 years
Use appropriate type for each door location
Ensure proper door alignment before replacing strips

title: Preventing Basement Moisture
description: Protect your basement from moisture damage with these proven prevention techniques.
tips: Ensure gutters and downspouts direct water away from foundation
Grade soil away from house foundation
Use a dehumidifier to maintain 30-50% humidity
Seal cracks in foundation walls promptly
Install a sump pump in flood-prone areas

title: Refinishing Wood Furniture
description: Restore old wood furniture to its former glory with professional refinishing techniques.
tips: Strip old finish completely before sanding
Sand with progressively finer grits (80→120→220)
Apply stain in direction of wood grain
Use multiple thin coats of finish instead of one thick coat
Allow proper drying time between coats
